info.name: Firefox Manage Addons (about:addons) Dark Theme
info.description:
A dark theme for the about:addons page on firefox.
May not fully work on non-english version of firefox.
info.additionalInfo:
Last Update: 8/2/17 @ 3:08 AM EDT
Version Log:
 • Version 1.1 - Added a option to remove 'Get Add-ons'
 • Version 1.0 - Released.

options.label: Yes
